title: Was Mike Pence Greeted by a Widespread Display of LGBT Rainbow Flags in Iceland?
subtitle: The U.S. vice president was met with protests on visits to two European countries in September 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: U.S. Vice President Mike Pence was greeted by a widespread display of LGBT rainbow flags on his visit to Reykjavík, Iceland, in September 2019.
